snippet: Investigators are still trying to find out who sent a series of suspicious letters to at least five hotels near the site of the Super Bowl....

headline.print_headline: Police Investigate Letters Sent to 5 NJ Hotels
headline.main: Police Investigate Letters Sent to 5 NJ Hotels

lead_paragraph: Investigators are still trying to find out who sent a series of suspicious letters to at least five hotels near the site of the Super Bowl.
